title: cannot connect to my msn.com e-mail in Thunderbird; been doing it for years but now password is not recognized.
content: my personal e-mail is @msn.com; been using it with Thunderbird for years, but lately it asks continually for my password and tells me login (imap/outlook) has failed. It's been getting more frequent and today after multiple attempts, and restarting my computer it still didn't work. I am able to use my password to sign into my msn.com account and see the e-mails using the mozilla browser (or chrome) but can't sign on at Thunderbird. I have another e-mail address in Thunderbird (at my own domain) and there have been no issues with that address. However, if I am looking at my personal/msn e-mails, then go to the other inbox and return to the msn inbox I am usually asked (repeatedly) for the msn password and login fails. The problem started a couple of weeks ago and has grown progressively worse/more frequent. Any ideas on what happened/changed and what I can do?
creator: ROXTRUAX

title: Email "move" between folders in latest Thunderbird (128) is unreliable, either failing or deleting messages
content:
Hi

I hope someone can provide me with some advice.

I have used Thunderbird since its birth and have always found it reliable. However the latest release seems to be having problems with moving emails.

Example 1 - I moved an email from my Inbox to a special folder. The email was present in full before the move. Only the header appeared to be copied. I could not undo this and attempting repair on both inbox and other folder failed, as did exit and re-start. The result is that this email is lost.

Example 2 - I went to do a bulk move from the search window (something I have done hundreds of times before without incident). As usual CTRL A, Move to <new folder>, emails greyed out but nothing happens. Exit, return, repeat - same result.

At other times, both these type of operations work fine. But it is unpredictable.

Relatedly, I observe that on start-up the Inbox initially shows as <no messages> and takes several seconds to populate. Also, my auto-filing Rules are also working inconsistently.

These two points, and the two examples, are new issues for me since 128 release. I am using Windows 10 Pro on an HP Envy 17" laptop.

Any suggestions welcome as I am now concerned about losing emails!

Best wishes Roland
creator: jollygreengiant

title: New Thunderbird User - Constant Hanging in Tasks module
content:
NOTE: This began with the previous version, and got worse after upgrading to the new version:

I've been looking for how/where to select a sound in the Task module (getting pop-ups). When I click on anything in the Task module, TBird hangs. It comes back in a few seconds, but the hangs continue.

When I spend more time trying to edit the Tasks, I also get hangs in the Email module (by clicking on anything).

Last night, after one T-Bird hang after another, everything on my computer slowed down, no heavy apps running. This morning I ran the pre-bootup diagnostics, which reported everything (memory, etc.) are okay.

So I'd like to t know how to get T-Bird running smoothly, or maybe I should forget the Tasks and Calendar and stick to email?
creator: KJS-LES

title: Non riesco a scaricare la posta certificata di poste italiane Poste (@pcert.postecert.it)
content:
Mail arrivara da: avvisi_pec@postecert.it

Gentile cliente, 

a partire dal giorno 10/06/2024 verranno dismessi meccanismi di autenticazione, utilizzati dai client desktop (a titolo esemplificativo non esaustivo: Outlook, thunderbird o altro strumento usato per accedere alla posta elettronica) CRAM-MD5, APOP, Digest-MD5  fortemente sconsigliati perché obsoleti, al fine di innalzare il livello di sicurezza adeguandolo agli standard correnti. Per continuare a fruire del servizio tramite client desktop, si raccomanda di procedere all’aggiornamento del proprio client di posta elettronica e alla verifica della congruità della configurazione utilizzata, di seguito riportata:  Server posta in arrivo: mail.postecert.it - protocollo pop3: il server richiede una connessione crittografata (ssl) porta 995 - protocollo imap: il server richiede una connessione crittografata (ssl) porta 993  Server posta in uscita: mail.postecert.it - protocollo smtp: il server richiede una connessione crittografata (ssl) porta 465 - Attivare la funzione: "Server della posta in uscita - Autenticazione del server necessaria"  In caso di bisogno, puoi contattare l’Assistenza, usando i riferimenti presenti sul sito https://www.poste.it.  Poste Italiane

Ora, tutte le impostazioni sono corrette, ho effettuato tutti gli aggiornamenti previsti da Thunderbird ma ancora non riesco ad avere gli accessi per scaricare la posta e devo entrare ogni volta direttamente nel portale della posta certificata di Poste Italiane per verificare l'arrivo nuove comunicazioni.

Cosa mi consigliate di fare? Un caro saluto, Nadir Marchiori
creator: nadir.marchiori

title: bericht verwijderen uit de map 'prulenbak'.
content:
beste mens,

wanneer een bericht verwijderd wil worden uit de map 'prullenbak' komt er altijd een venster met de vraag 'weet je zeker dat het bericht verwijder wordt' of iets van die strekking. nu kreeg ik dat twee keer achter elkaar voordat er verwijderd werd. dus ik dacht dan klik er een weg, dus 'niet meer vragen' aangeklikt. nu komt de vraag helemaal niet meer. hoe kan ik dat herstellen? dus dat dat venster met de vraag of ik zeker weten het bericht wil verwijderen weer verschijnt wanneer ik een bericht wil verwijderen.

alvast bedankt voor jouw antwoord en moeite!

hartelijke groet, astrid buijs
creator: astrid.buijs

title: Feature Request - Count next to "Tag" folders
content:

I use the tagging feature and have my tags shown at the top. However, I am prone to forgetting that email have been tagged as at a glance it is not really possible to tell if there are any tagged emails in the folder

Is there a way to set a "count" next to each tag so that I can tell if there is still emails requiring attention? If not, is this something that has been looked at?
